name: earth defENDER (perezgrin)
description:
PLAY IT ONLINE HERE

The year is 2070. The International Outer Space Organism has detected a serious menace. Some galaxies away, an enemy fleet is coming towards our planet. The solution is to train gifted children to become the next soldiers in this future war. You are one of them.

Move your Spaceship around the screen and hit your enemies with your laser. Clear the screen to get to the next level.

Some enemies are above or below your ship, you won't hit them unless you reach the same plane. Place the ship near and press 's'.

LEVEL 1:

The beginning of your training, learn to move your ship and clear the screen of static enemies.

LEVEL 2:

Avoid moving enemies that also shoot you.

LEVEL 3:

Master your movement skills through narrow paths

...

HINTS:

  • Watch out when swapping views while enemies are shooting.
  • When the buggers are out of reach, they show only in their ’wired’ form (borders).
  • Take advantage of the seconds your ship is invulnerable (blinking frame).
  • Learn the enemies movements, but be aware that they will also learn from you. Don’t do always the same thing.
